text: Niall Campbell Ferguson (; born 18 April 1964)Biography Niall Ferguson is a Scottish-American historian. He was born in Glasgow. He is the Milbank Family Senior Fellow at the Hoover Institution. He was a professor at Harvard University and New York University. Ferguson writes and lectures on international history, economic and financial history and British and American imperialism. He is a contributing editor for Bloomberg Television"Conservative Historian Niall Ferguson Blasts Trump's Foreign Policy".
